Activated abilities of nonland permanents you control cost {1} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in the cost to less than one mana.
[i]Storycraft[/i] – As long as you control three or more enchantments, at the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {C}{C}.
Cycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]
